Sentencas: Ni-YSZ/YSZ bi-layers for SOFCs were fabricated by spark plasma sintering (SPS).
Titulo: Spark Plasma Sintered Ni-YSZ/YSZ Bi-Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Optimization of SPS parameters of YSZ and NiO/YSZ powders was performed in order to fabricate anode and electrolyte with desired microstructures.
Titulo: Spark Plasma Sintered Ni-YSZ/YSZ Bi-Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The effect of sintering conditions on microstructure and electrical properties of YSZ was studied.
Titulo: Spark Plasma Sintered Ni-YSZ/YSZ Bi-Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The influence of processing parameters and amount of pore-forming agent on the microstructures of Ni/YSZ cermets was also investigated.
Titulo: Spark Plasma Sintered Ni-YSZ/YSZ Bi-Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: It was shown that the amount of pore-former and in situ reduction of nickel oxide had a substantial effect on microstructure of the cermets.
Titulo: Spark Plasma Sintered Ni-YSZ/YSZ Bi-Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The in situ reduced anode demonstrates sufficiently homogeneous distribution of Ni and YSZ making a conduction path for electrons and ions.
Titulo: Spark Plasma Sintered Ni-YSZ/YSZ Bi-Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Ni-YSZ/YSZ bi-layers with crack-free and well-bonded anode/electrolyte interface were obtained.
Titulo: Spark Plasma Sintered Ni-YSZ/YSZ Bi-Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Furthermore, warping was not observed for the produced bi-layers.
Titulo: Spark Plasma Sintered Ni-YSZ/YSZ Bi-Layers for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
